highlights: Focus on SEO to search ranking
snippet: GTS Services in the Portland area hired me as their in-house designer/developer to completely revive their online presence. My first initiative was to rebrand the company geared towards expanding into markets the company was aiming to become a part of in the near future. They also had multiple websites that needed to be revived with updated design. I built these upon the WordPress CMS to enable other employees the ability to create and edit content.

highlights: Complete website build using HTML5, CSS3, and jQuery
